entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 01 Nov 2023 20:02:25
entry.summary:
Apple Sees Highest Ever Smartphone Shipments in India in Q3 2023; Market Records Flat YoY Growth (Tech)
- Apple experienced its highest ever smartphone shipments in India during the third quarter of 2023.
- However, the overall smartphone market in India only saw flat year-on-year growth.

XR (AR & VR Headsets) Report on Market Insights and Trends, Q2 2023 (Tech)
- A report provides insights and trends on XR (AR & VR) headsets in the second quarter of 2023.

Company news: Erica L. Masler hired by Hancock Estabrook law firm - syracuse.com (Business)
- Erica L. Masler has been hired by the Hancock Estabrook law firm, as reported by syracuse.com.

Elon Musk and Sam Altman are expected to attend the UK's AI Safety Summit. Here's why it's taking place at a former top-secret WWII facility. (AI)
- Elon Musk and Sam Altman are anticipated to attend the UK's AI Safety Summit, which will be held at a former top-secret WWII facility.

CD Rates and Savings Rates Today | Rates Remain Steady with Fed Meeting Imminent (Business)
- CD rates and savings rates are currently stable, with an imminent Federal Reserve meeting.

'I would never recommend this to anybody': We accidentally bought a derelict Victorian apartment for $12,000 at an auction and transformed it into our dream home (Business)
- A story about accidentally purchasing a derelict Victorian apartment at an auction for $12,000 and renovating it into a dream home.

Personal Loan Interest Rates Today, November 1, 2023 | Rates Stall as Fed Meeting Looms (Business)
- Personal loan interest rates are currently stagnant as a Federal Reserve meeting approaches.

The US economy is surging – but problems elsewhere could still torpedo profits for big companies like Apple and Tesla (Business)
- The US economy is experiencing growth, but challenges in other areas could still impact the profits of major companies like Apple and Tesla.

UK household wealth has tanked and it's a sign of what could happen in the US (Business)
- The decline in UK household wealth serves as a warning of potential consequences in the US.

About 3.5 million more American families went hungry after food prices spiked and the pandemic-era child tax credit ended (Business)
- The increase in food prices and the end of the pandemic-era child tax credit resulted in approximately 3.5 million more American families experiencing hunger.

Mortgage Interest Rates Today, November 1, 2023 | Rates Down a Bit Ahead of Fed Announcement (Business)
- Mortgage interest rates have slightly decreased in anticipation of a Federal Reserve announcement.

The Biden Administration wants to close a retirement savings 'loophole' that could be costing you 20% on your investments (Business)
- The Biden Administration aims to eliminate a retirement savings loophole that may be causing individuals to lose 20% on their investments.

I tried Walmart's self-checkout to see if it was as frustrating as some shoppers say. Here's what I found. (Business)
- An individual shares their experience of trying Walmart's self-checkout system and provides their findings.

From barbers to firefighters, the most AI-proof jobs are blue collar (AI)
- Blue-collar jobs, such as barbers and firefighters, are considered to be the most resistant to being replaced by AI.

Show HN: Clone someone and talk to them like in real life (AI)
- A project is showcased where individuals can clone someone and engage in realistic conversations with them.

WeWork, a company once worth $47 billion, might soon go bankrupt (Business)
- WeWork, a company that was previously valued at $47 billion, is facing the possibility of bankruptcy.

Airline Apologizes for Forcing Disabled Man to Drag Himself Off Plane With No Wheelchair (Business)
- An airline issued an apology after a disabled man was forced to drag himself off a plane without a wheelchair.

China wants to win the gene therapy race—and it’ll spend millions (Tech)
- China aims to lead the gene therapy race and is willing to invest significant funds to achieve this goal.

What are the hardest problems in tech we should be more focused on as a society? (Tech)
- A discussion on the most challenging problems in the tech industry that society should prioritize.

Western Digital Flash Business Spin Off Likely To Have Little Impact (Tech)
- The spin-off of Western Digital's flash business is expected to have minimal impact.

Baltimore buried this river a century ago. Now, an artist is bringing it back to life (Tech)
- An artist is working to revive a river in Baltimore that was buried a century ago.

Meet Dot, an AI companion designed by an Apple alum, here to help you live your best life (AI)
- Dot, an AI companion created by a former Apple employee, is introduced as a tool to enhance one's life.

Wiley Laney Obituary - Bowser Family Funeral Home - Broken Bow ... - Legacy.com (Business)
- An obituary for Wiley Laney is featured on the Bowser Family Funeral Home website.

I got laid off from Amazon. They've tried 4 times to rehire me, but I can't go back. (Business)
- An individual shares their experience of being laid off from Amazon and declining multiple rehire attempts.

Jeff Bezos' net worth: How the ex-Amazon CEO went from startup founder to one of the richest people in the world (Business)
- The journey of Jeff Bezos, from a startup founder to becoming one of the wealthiest individuals globally, is explored.

Bye California: 7 people who fled the state share the culture shocks they've experienced and why they have no regrets (Business)
- Seven individuals who left California discuss the cultural adjustments they have encountered and why they have no regrets about their decision.

I asked Meta's Kendall Jenner-inspired AI and ChatGPT for relationship advice. Only one actually responded like a friend. (AI)
- An individual sought relationship advice from Meta's Kendall Jenner-inspired AI and ChatGPT, with one providing a more friendly response.

I'm a girlfriend-for-hire. I use AI to help me satisfy customers, make more money, and feel better about my work. (AI)
- An individual who works as a girlfriend-for-hire discusses how they utilize AI to enhance their services and improve their job satisfaction.

Charging, road trips, maintenance, and more: 8 EV owners reveal the realities of going electric (Tech)
- Eight electric vehicle owners share their experiences and insights regarding charging, road trips, maintenance, and other aspects of owning an EV.

A popular tiny-home community near Tampa just added rentals under 400 square feet starting at $1,300 a month – take a look around (Business)
- A well-known tiny-home community close to Tampa has introduced rentals under 400 square feet, with prices starting at $1,300 per month.
